Experience.name: Pulse Audition (EssilorLuxottica)
Experience.summary: Research internship focused on Acoustic Feedback Cancellation (AFC) for hearing aids.

Experience.name: Huawei Paris Research Center
Experience.summary: Conducted research on computer architecture and hardware accelerators in many-core RISC-V & ARM heterogeneous based systems.
highlights: Designed a Distributed Shared Memory architecture to enhance HAC (Hardware Accelerator) utilization.
Worked on HW/SW co-design, efficient C/C++ kernels, compilers, and low-level programming.

Experience.name: Talan
Experience.summary: Designed and developed, in a team, a smart tap system for water flow analysis and prediction.
highlights: Integrated user preferences, daily routines, and time patterns into the control system.
Implemented the solution on a System-on-Chip (SoC).

Education.institution: Télécom Paris, Polytechnic Institute of Paris
